bill_title: revise administrative rule to add palmer amaranth as a prohibited noxious weed seed.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise administrative rule to add palmer amaranth as a prohibited noxious weed seed. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That ARSD 12:36:03:01 be amended to read: 12:36:03:01...Prohibited noxious weed seeds. The prohibited noxious weed seeds are as follows: (1)..Field bindweed (Convolvulus arvensis); (2)..Leafy spurge (Euphorbia esula and E. X pseudovirgata); (3)..Hoary cress (Cardaria draba); (4)..Russian knapweed (Centaurea repens); (5)..Perennial sowthistle (Sonchus arvensis); (6)..Canada thistle (Cirsium arvensis); (7)..Quackgrass (Agrophyron repens); and (8)..Horse nettle (Solanum carolinense); and (9) Palmer amaranth (Amaranthus palmeri). 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
